meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kara Spak DJ Schepker Russ Porter Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5984.

td.p: Kara Spak, a newspaper reporter from Chicago, Illinois
DJ Schepker, a Ph.D. student in business from Lenexa, Kansas
Russ Porter, a water systems engineer from Seattle, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,001)

tr.td: MODERN FICTION
NO. 1 "LOVE" SONGS
FADS
2-WORD SCIENCE TERMS
ALCOHOLICS EPONYMOUS
STARTS & ENDS WITH "T"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The title of this William Styron novel refers to a devastating ultimatum given by a Nazi soldier')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The title of this William Styron novel refers to a devastating ultimatum given by a Nazi soldier

toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(DJ: What is "Love Potion No. 9"?)

"The Love You Save May Be Your Own"

Kara
')

\"Paul Revere\'s Ride\"')

DJ
